Projects.title: Community Wildlife Conservancy Management Plan
Projects.description: Developed a comprehensive management plan for a community-based wildlife conservancy, focusing on sustainable resource use and conservation strategies.

Projects.title: Tourism Development Feasibility Study
Projects.description: Conducted a feasibility study and financial modeling for a new eco-tourism lodge in a protected area.

Projects.title: National Park Ecosystem Monitoring Program
Projects.description: Designed and implemented an ecosystem monitoring strategy for a national park to track biodiversity changes.

Projects.title: Technical Report on Climate Impact Assessment
Projects.description: Authored a detailed report assessing the impacts of climate change on a coastal ecosystem.

Projects.title: Social Media Awareness Campaign for Conservation
Projects.description: Developed and managed a digital campaign to raise awareness about wildlife conservation among local communities.

Projects.title: Training Workshop on Environmental Monitoring
Projects.description: Facilitated a capacity-building workshop for local stakeholders on effective environmental monitoring techniques.
